entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 12:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
